flowers.description: With its feminine feel and European charm, this alluring glass cube is the perfect Mother's Day surprise! It's carefully hand-decorated and filled with a fresh bouquet of daisies and roses.
flowers.name: Wildflower In Flight Bouquet

flowers.description: The shimmering, iridescent aqua blue glass of this stunning cylinder vase is the perfect partner for a fresh, fabulous bouquet of lavender roses, alstroemeria and tulips!
flowers.name: Art Glass Garden Bouquet

flowers.description: Just fabulous! From its perky pink cube and perfect pink roses, to its textural greens and dramatic pink lilies, this chic bouquet is flora at its finest!
flowers.name: Fabulous Flora Bouquet

flowers.description: Timeless and touching, this serenely beautiful bouquet of peach and white blooms is perfectly presented in a classic mercury glass hurricane. Two gifts in one, it later transforms into a shimmering candleholder.
flowers.name: Endless Lovelies Bouquet

flowers.description: Timeless and touching, this serenely beautiful bouquet of peach and white blooms is perfectly presented in a classic mercury glass hurricane. Two gifts in one, it later transforms into a shimmering candleholder.
flowers.name: Endless Lovelies Bouquet

flowers.description: The shimmering, iridescent aqua blue glass of this stunning cylinder vase is the perfect partner for a fresh, fabulous bouquet of lavender roses, alstroemeria and tulips!
flowers.name: Art Glass Garden Bouquet
